metadata.title: CVE-2021-46283 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: nf_tables_newset in net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c in the Linux kernelbefore 5.12.13 allows local users to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and general protection fault) because of the missinginitialization for nft_set_elem_expr_alloc. A local user can set anetfilter table expression in their own namespace.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
